name: Forest of Horrors
description:
“Forest of Horrors” is a 2D endless runner game following the story of “Love”, an apprentice witch who while seeking a white sage entered the Forest of Horrors and encountered the guardian of the Forest and his minions. She uses her ability to fly to escape from the guardian of the forest.

Thanks for the amazing work of:

[1] Background: by saukgp

https://saurabhkgp.itch.io/the-dawn-parallax-background

[2] Boss enemy: by SR Kerala

 https://sr-studios-kerala.itch.io/skeleton-warrior-spritesheet-animations

[3] player: by pipoya

 https://pipoya.itch.io/pipoya-free-2d-game-character-sprites

[4] Bomb: by Junior aj

https://junior-aj.itch.io/monsterfly  

[5] Music: by ArcOfDream

 https://arcofdream.itch.io/monolith-ost

[6] More Music: by JDSherbert  https://jdsherbert.itch.io/minigame-music-pack [7] Sound Effects: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/?page=3
